Sentencas: The production of fuel cell technology for commercial purposes is hindered by limited durability and cost.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: Hence, we focused on the thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) that is fuelled with hydrogen produced from human waste to generate 200 kW power.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: This was achieved through computer simulation using Thermolib 5.4 version (a MATLAB/Simulink's software).
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: Two configurations were adopted for biomass production and are based on gasification and slow pyrolysis.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: The results obtained revealed that producer gas from gasification and slow pyrolysis have a thermal efficiency of 82.2 % and 34.69 respectively.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: Lower heating value (LHV) of 113.14 kJ/mole and 466.37 kJ/mole accounted for the variation.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: Additional energy requirements of 571.50 kW for gasification and 353.04 kW for slow pyrolysis would be needed to achieve the set power output.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: Exergy analysis further showed that producer gas (slow pyrolysis) had the highest exergy input of 11848.86 kW and corresponding output of 11160.91 kW which was far higher than that of producer gas (gasification) with exergy input as 5,992.17 kW, and exergy output of 5698.44 kW.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: The difference was due to the presence of ethane which had the highest standard exergy of 1437.2 kJ/mole in addition to the methane content of the gas.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: The exergy efficiency indicated that auto-thermal reformer (ATR) had an efficiency of 99.71% and 99.6% for gasification and slow pyrolysis respectively.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: The SOFC from producer gas gasification had an efficiency of 57.59 % with the reformate stream having a mole fraction of 0.3543 and 0.0028 for hydrogen and carbon monoxide respectively whereas producer gas from slow pyrolysis had 72.50% exergy efficiency with mole fractions of 0.5194 of hydrogen and 0.1288 of carbon monoxide in the reformate.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: The cost analysis indicated that the total annual cost for producer gas from slow pyrolysis configuration was $190,380.70, which is higher than that of producer gas from gasification configuration by 52.66%.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: Exergy and economic performance favoured the choice of gasification configuration as the preferred route to produce hydrogen gas for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell configuration.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel

Sentencas: We concluded that fuelling of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with producer gas from human waste is viable, efficient, and highly economical.
Titulo: Thermo-economic analysis of solid oxide fuel cell using human waste as a source of fuel
